boat.construction_details: Cedar speedstrip on ply bulkheads and iroko keel

for_sales.sales_text:
Golant Gaffer , two berths, with road trailer 2014 home built with professional assistance in Northumberland.

Cedar speed strip on marine ply bulkheads and long iroko keel. Hull and decks covered in grp. Classic Marine bronze fittings.

Collar’s mast. Beta 10 engine refitted last year.  LoD 5.71M B 2.13M d 0.83M Displacement 1500Kg Ballast ratio 45%

A chance to own one of these beautiful Roger Dongray designed gaff rigged cutters ideal for weekend cruising.

Sailed on the west coast of Scotland out of Craobh Marina. Wonderful to sail!

The sturdy Mersea/Snipe road trailer was purchased 2012

Lying ashore in Northumberland

boat.name: Sea Witch
